dialog: Great choices! I think I'll join you for the stir-fried squids. And while we're at it, we should try their special wizard brew cocktails too.
Wizard brew cocktails? That sounds intriguing. What kind of ingredients do they use?
Only the finest magical ingredients, my friend. They infuse it with enchanted herbs and spices to give it that extra kick.
Wow, this place just keeps getting better. I can't wait to try one of those wizard brew cocktails.
Me too! I've heard they even cast a spell of good luck on each one for the lucky drinker.
Let's make a toast to good food, good drinks, and good company then.
Agreed! To good food, good drinks, and good company!
So, while we're waiting for our food, do you want to cast some spells to pass the time?
Sure! What kind of spell do you want to cast?
I was thinking of a spell of good fortune. Maybe we can help bring some good luck to the other diners here.
That's a great idea! And who knows, maybe our good fortune spell will bring us some extra delicious dishes to try!
